description:
Julieta Juris is a mobile suit pilot who belongs to the Arianrhod Fleet. Though she has no pedigree or rank, her piloting skills are outstanding, and Rustal took note of her abilities and assigned her to Arianrhod. She uses a customized version of the Reginlaze, the successor to the Graze.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Julieta Juris
